price: Indeed, Allah defends those who believe, and Allah does not like every treacherous and ungrateful.
arabic: ۞ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُدَٰفِعُ عَنِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ خَوَّانٖ كَفُورٍ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
